Challenge:

When going digital one concern was whether they had to control different RIPs separately or if they could continue using the existing Agfa :Apogee workflow system.

The seamless integration of the EFI™ Fiery® server with Agfa’s :Apogee workflow system is the key element to production efficiency and business growth at Skånetryck.

Results:

We thought digital would be a nice little complement to our existing production, but it has become the fastest growing side of the business.

EFI Fiery DFE integration to Agfa :Apogee: Skånetryck case study

Offset Meets Digital: Seamless Hybrid Workflow Integration at Skånetryck

Download Now
Request a Demo

Solution:

Within hours from when the technician said he was ready we started real life production—this is how easy the Fiery system is to operate, and how well it integrated with our :Apogee workflow.

What's Next:

The Fiery system can be extended with MIS and web-to-print solutions, and this is something Skånetryck is looking into. But since digital production is fairly new to the company the increased demand is the first thing to manage.

“We thought digital would be a nice little complement to our existing production, but it has become the fastest growing side of the business,” explains Håkan.

“We need to expand this faster and sooner than expected, and perhaps include large-format in the mix,” says Walhed. “We know EFI to be good at those types of solutions as well, so we are quite confident they are likely to be part of our expansion.
